text: I'm looking for a Singaporean restaurant in the east part of Cambridge. Do you know of any?
I'm not able to help with that request.

You're in luck! I found a Chinese restaurant in the east part of Cambridge that might interest you. Hotel Mimosa Bar on 7 Barnwell Road, Fen Ditton, CB5 8WR offers Chinese cuisine. They're moderately priced and have a lovely atmosphere. Would you like to reserve a table? Your reservation number would be 1421.
Yes, that sounds great. Can you give me the phone number of Hotel Mimosa Bar?
The phone number for Hotel Mimosa Bar is 3775160593.

Thank you for the info. That's all I need. Thank you and goodbye!

END
You're welcome! It was nice assisting you. Have a great day and enjoy your meal at Hotel Mimosa Bar! Goodbye!
